name: NSData.Base64EncodingOptions
desc: Options for methods used to Base64 encode data.

items.name: static var lineLength64Characters: NSData.Base64EncodingOptions
items.desc: Set the maximum line length to 64 characters, after which a line ending is inserted.

items.name: static var lineLength76Characters: NSData.Base64EncodingOptions
items.desc: Set the maximum line length to 76 characters, after which a line ending is inserted.

items.name: static var endLineWithCarriageReturn: NSData.Base64EncodingOptions
items.desc: When a maximum line length is set, specify that the line ending to insert should include a carriage return.

items.name: static var endLineWithLineFeed: NSData.Base64EncodingOptions
items.desc: When a maximum line length is set, specify that the line ending to insert should include a line feed.
